title: Gold Jungler LF Ranked Team (can also fill)
body:
Hi I'm a gold 5 jungler and I'm looking for a goldish/high silver team.
I can play most jungle champions but best with the tankier support ones ( {{champion:32}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:20}}  )
Otherise, if youre looking for a player for another position, I can also play mid and support fairly well. My adc is good too but my top is generally pretty awful.
I keep a level head when playing and avoid flaming when behind or playing cocky when ahead.
My ign is TehCrazyII so check my stats out if you want and hit me up if you like what you see.
